mapper.select: SELECT C.ID , C.CUST_ID , C.ITEM_ID , C.CNT , C.RDATE , CU.NAME AS CUST_NAME , I.NAME AS ITEM_NAME , I.PRICE AS ITEM_PRICE , I.IMGNAME AS ITEM_IMGNAME FROM CART C, CUST CU, ITEM I WHERE C.CUST_ID = CU.ID AND C.ITEM_ID = I.ID AND C.ID = #{id}
select count(*) from cart where cust_id=#{cust_id}

select ca.cart_id, ca.cust_id, ca.item_id, ca.cnt, ca.item_rdate, cu.cust_name, i.item_img, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.flower_color, i.flower_type, i.flower_size from cart ca, cust cu, item i where ca.cust_id = cu.cust_id AND ca.item_id = i.item_id AND cu.cust_id = #{cid}

SELECT C.ID , C.CUST_ID , C.ITEM_ID , C.CNT , C.RDATE , CU.NAME AS CUST_NAME , I.NAME AS ITEM_NAME , I.PRICE AS ITEM_PRICE , I.IMGNAME AS ITEM_IMGNAME FROM CART C, CUST CU, ITEM I WHERE C.CUST_ID = CU.ID AND C.ITEM_ID = I.ID
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart USING dual ON (cust_id = #{cust_id} AND item_id = #{item_id}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_id, cust_id, item_id, cnt, item_rdate) VALUES (cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cust_id}, #{item_id}, #{cnt}, SYSDATE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cnt = cnt + #{cnt}
